file_content.text: SIS is talking about building our own Arc Emitter--give the White Maw a taste of their own medicine.
Wow! I heard the blast from here. That Arc Emitter must've gone up like a rocket!
Thanks. We found some Anomid stuff while we were investigating 'em; take anything that catches your eye.
Remember: Find a diagnostic pad, calibrate it at a control point, then take the pad to the Arc Emitter. Else this won't work.
Can you believe this? My lieutenant said those White Maw pirates were dumber than concussed mynocks.
But, seems the pirates hired some Anomid tech geniuses to do their thinking for them. If this report's right, we're in a world of trouble.
There must be plenty of salvaged ordnance and starship cannons for them to work with.
Are they making weapons?
Weapons. Wish it was that simple, sir.
The White Maw are dangerous enough, without superior technology at their command.
This does sound worrying.
Pirates are nothing if not adaptable, Corporal. Keep that in mind.
You underestimated the enemy.
I know, sir, but no one saw this coming.
It'd be easy enough to stop those techs; just make them a higher offer.
Can't the Republic hire them?
I dunno. It's like they see this as a challenge, not a job.
I'm not that familiar with that species.
What are Anomids?
They wear these weird masks because they can't talk. Kind of stuck-up, but their tech is amazing.
If a few engineers can tip the balance, the Republic's worse off than I thought.
Why? They're just technicians.
The Anomids are building something called the Arc Emitter. Destroys any equipment that runs off a generator--they can cut off everyone's heat and power just like that.
But, they've only got lousy White Maw equipment to work with. Might be a way to trick that Arc Emitter, if you can get close.
Count me in.
The White Maw's probably protecting the Arc Emitter, and anyone working on it.
I'd need to be careful.
Best plan would be making that emitter target itself. Boom! No salvage left for the White Maw.
The Anomids working the Arc Emitter use these diagnostic pads, to set its targeting right.
Get hold of one, calibrate it at a control point, and jam it into the emitter. Wonders of technology will do the rest.
Not me. [Refuse quest]
Okay, but if your heaters suddenly go dead, you'll know who was behind it.
Stupid White Maw, making my life difficult....
